title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The artfully designed sword showcases a striking blend of elegance and menace, featuring a polished silver blade accented with intricate gold detailing. Its sleek, elongated form is both aerodynamic and intimidating, optimized for swift, precise strikes. The hilt, adorned with a dark, ornate design, offers a firm grip, ensuring stability in battle. A central emblem, possibly symbolizing power or honor, adds a captivating focal point. This weapon is not just a tool for combat but a testament to craftsmanship and lore, likely hinting at a rich backstory within the game's universe, where it serves as a symbol of strength and legacy.
